TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InstanceState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: This enumeration contains a list of states of an instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState Completed = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the instance is in completed state. A completed instance cannot be persisted again in the future.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState Initialized = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the instance is initialized. An initialized instance is an instance that has been persisted at least once and can be persisted again in the future.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState Uninitialized = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the instance is uninitialized. An uninitialized instance is an instance that has never been persisted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the instance is in Unknown state.
